websiteDescription: Convert Kubernetes environment variables to .env format. You can drop a YAML file or click anywhere below this paragraph to upload a file.

confirmation.title: Page Reload
confirmation.disclaimer: Changing the language requires a page reload. You will lose all your changes.
confirmation.question: Are you sure you want to reload this page?

dropZonePlaceholder: Drop a file or Click to browse

fileUpload.unexpected: Something unexpected happened. Please make sure the file you're trying to upload is a YAML file. If this persists, you can create an issue on our Github repository.
fileUpload.dropRejected: We're not able to process your file. Please make sure it is a YAML file.
fileUpload.invalidFormat: We're not able to process your file. Please make sure it is a valid Kubernetes YAML file.
